column5: Well....I've had a very reliable 1986 Polaris that I have used for ice fishing for the last number of years.  I will likely keep the old girl for fishing still, however .....  I was looking for a new toy for this winter and this is what I picked up today.  It's a 1999 MXZ 600...    I'll bet we have the mildest winter in years now...kinda like going out and buying a new snowblower..lol    Hey GreenCoachDog...you ever been on a sled?????  Hopefully see ya on the lake....  Cheers  Craig
great sleds handle very nice and reliable,quick as well ,nice Fat boy ?? over in the corner
Very nice Craig    Congratulation on a fine sled

Yes I have!!!... and it's a blast!!!  That looks like a real "go fasty" there!!!... looks like it's doin' a hunert just sittin' still!  Doesn't look like it's gonna be too much longer before you can use it too!  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=25540  Be keerful on that thing!!!
I really liked those sleds Sandbag. Quick, handle well and easy to service.
Nice sled! No snow expected here in london either, because I got a snowblower last week. (well not enough snow to use it)  jjcanoe
Im looking for the exact same sled, where did you buy it?  how much? how many km's?
Sent ya PM krawler  Cheers  Craig
